text: Studentersamfundet or Studentersamfunnet can refer to one of several Norwegian student societies: *The Student Society in Trondheim (Studentersamfundet i Trondhjem) in Trondheim *The Norwegian Students' Society (Det Norske Studentersamfund) in Oslo Studentersamfundet may also refer to the following Danish student organisations: * , a leftist breakaway group from the Studenterforeningen *
title: Studentersamfundet
